text: Language learning or language acquisition is the process by which humans acquire the capacity to use language. Language learning may also refer to: * Language Learning (journal), a scholarly journal covering language acquisition and learning * Second language learning, the process of learning a second language and the scientific discipline studying that process ** Language education, the process and practice of teaching or learning a second or foreign language through study *Language processing, the mental process by which humans create and understand language ==See also== * Language (disambiguation) * Learn (disambiguation) *
title: Language learning (disambiguation)
